patthana23.21:4.1: Navipākaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.21:5.1: Navipākaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.21:6.1: Navipākaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.21:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
